name: The origin is in infinity
description: Cubes inside cubes that move in a three-dimensional space generating a fractal tetrahedron. While the cubes are moving following straight lines the global shape appears to be rotating around its center. The piece seeks to expose how the global complexity is generated based in the individual simplicity. //  A procedural animation by Victor Doval. // 1080 x 1080 px. // 300 frames. // 12 seconds. // Created using Blender & Sverchok
